keyentry.description: Turns the landscape grid on
Turns the landscape height bands on

keyentry.name: HUD_ITEMS
keyentry.description: Toggles the various HUD items on and off

keyentry.name: AUTO_AIM
keyentry.description: Aims current tank towards point on landscape

keyentry.name: FIRE_WEAPON
keyentry.description: Fire current weapon

keyentry.name: UNDO_MOVE
keyentry.description: Changes the tanks evelevation, power and rotation back to those used to make the last shot.

keyentry.name: TURN_LEFT
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the left

keyentry.name: TURN_LEFT_SLOW
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the left slowly

keyentry.name: TURN_LEFT_FAST
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the left quickly

keyentry.name: TURN_RIGHT
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the right

keyentry.name: TURN_RIGHT_SLOW
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the right slowly

keyentry.name: TURN_RIGHT_FAST
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the right quicky

keyentry.name: ROTATE_UP
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's angle of elevation

keyentry.name: ROTATE_UP_SLOW
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's angle of elevation slowly

keyentry.name: ROTATE_UP_FAST
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's angle of elevation quickly

keyentry.name: ROTATE_DOWN
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's angle of elevation

keyentry.name: ROTATE_DOWN_SLOW
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's angle of elevation slowly

keyentry.name: ROTATE_DOWN_FAST
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's angle of elevation quickly

keyentry.name: INCREASE_POWER
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's shot power

keyentry.name: INCREASE_POWER_SLOW
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's shot power slowly

keyentry.name: INCREASE_POWER_FAST
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's shot power quickly

keyentry.name: DECREASE_POWER
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's shot power

keyentry.name: DECREASE_POWER_SLOW
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's shot power slowly

keyentry.name: DECREASE_POWER_FAST
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's shot power quickly

keyentry.name: CHANGE_UP_WEAPON
keyentry.description: Changes to the next available weapon

keyentry.name: CHANGE_DOWN_WEAPON
keyentry.description: Changes to the previous available weapon

keyentry.name: ENABLE_PARACHUTES
keyentry.description: Enables parachutes

keyentry.name: USE_BATTERY
keyentry.description: Uses one battery

keyentry.name: SAVE_SCREEN
keyentry.description: Saves the screen as a bitamp file

keyentry.name: CAMERA_TOP_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the top view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_BEHIND_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the behind view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_TANK_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the tank view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_GUN_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the gun view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_LEFT_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the left view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_RIGHT_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the right view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_LEFTFAR_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the far left view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_RIGHTFAR_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the far right view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_ACTION_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the gun view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_SPECTATOR_VIEW
keyentry.description: Changes the camera angle to the spectator view

keyentry.name: CAMERA_ROTATE_LEFT
keyentry.description: Rotates the camara left

keyentry.name: CAMERA_ROTATE_RIGHT
keyentry.description: Rotates the camara right

keyentry.name: CAMERA_ROTATE_UP
keyentry.description: Rotates the camara up

keyentry.name: CAMERA_ROTATE_DOWN
keyentry.description: Rotates the camara down

keyentry.name: CAMERA_ZOOM_IN
keyentry.description: Zoom the camrea in

keyentry.name: CAMERA_ZOOM_OUT
keyentry.description: Zoom the camrea in

keyentry.name: CAMERA_NOLIMIT
keyentry.description: Allow the camera to move through the landscape

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_X1
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate in normal time

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_X2
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate twice as fast

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_X3
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate three time as fast

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_X4
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate four time as fast

keyentry.name: CONSOLE
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the game console

keyentry.name: SHOW_QUIT_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the quit dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_HELP_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the help dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_TALK_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the talk dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_RULES_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the rules dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_SCORE_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the score dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_WIND_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the wind dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_PLAN_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the plan dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_AIM_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the aiming dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_WEAPON_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the weapon choosing dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_TEAM_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the team dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_PLAYER_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the player dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_KIBITZ_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the no kibitz dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_KILL_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the kill all players dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_CAMERA_DIALOG
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the camera dialog
